title: League won't launch after new update? Keep getting a bugsplat error. How can I fix this?
body: Everytime I try and open League it asks me to send or dont send an error. Only happened after new patch has been installed.

replies.body: I've been getting it during the patch when it fails with an "unspecified error".
I may be able to help with some more info.  At what % are you receiving this error?

After seeing your message I started the patch again to give you the information, however it appears to be working now so someone must have fixed it. 
Thank you though for trying to help. Hope you have a great day.

Bugsplats occur when the game fails to render, and it can happen for a few reasons like bad drivers or game files.  Run through the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to help troubleshoot towards a resolution.  Let me know if you have any questions!
